title: Rogue Officer
description: Griffin Hargrove was one of the CIA's most elite officers.Until a terrorist attack stole half of his arm and left him in a world of near-total silence.Now, he doesn't know if he'll ever work again. And without his job, who is he?Finding love should be the last thing on his mind.Until he sees her. Until her heart speaks to him in ways he doesn't need to hear to believe.He'll go rogue to save her. And maybe...reclaim a piece of himself he thought lost forever.
author: Patricia D. Eddy
